change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed cargo bay space check for strong box

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed Terran actor being overwritten in recover shares 1

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Clean up of actor, ships etc..

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Improved Passenger ejection

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Improved station finding

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed guidance updating if docked before talking at several points

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed paying hacker correct sum, instead of being paid the wrong amount...

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Removed Argon as defend station race for Terran starts

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Added contingency for player destroying station in defend station mission

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Player can no longer eject strong box/blood stained note, will also switch ships with them

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Increased Penalty for destroying dual convoy ships

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed incorrect message on completing Tour of a Lifetime

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Player needs to be docked to complete auction

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Set mission critical stations as invincible

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Added message telling player to wait for asteroid ship to be prepared and updated guidance accordingly

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed mission stalling if insufficient credits to pay for asteroid ship

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed messages for deliver hacker/cartography chips

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed messages for deliver hacker/cartography chips

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Added fail safes for ejecting passsengers

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Set asteroid ship as vulnerable when in player hands

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Various fixes for text ids, remove debug messages

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Moved 'Reward Free' texts to textid's

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Improved sector/station finding to avoid plot stop due to sector/station not being found.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed duplicate text for two of corporate decisions.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Changed Build station/deliver wares to not add wares to station to prevent mission breaking if no space.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Fixed bug with build station/deliver wares mission not finding station.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: Disabled'addtext' on several missions to prevent out of context messages in incoming messages.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: remove reliance on jump gates - now added via map file.

change.author: Dillpickle
change.description: initial version

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where the briefing will be localised

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: ShipName
param.comment: Where the choosen ship will be localized

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored

set_value.name: L2M024.ShareAdjust
set_value.exact: {value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total}-{value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount}

set_value.name: L2M024.SR4ShareReward
set_value.exact: ({value@L2M024.SR4ShareAmount}*{value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount})/{value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total}

param.name: StationType
param.comment: The type of station to build, overrides ware and race

cue.name: L2M024 SR8 Agents Collect No Space
L2M024 SR8 Agents Collect No Space Reset

reset_cue.cue: L2M024 SR8 Agents Collect No Space

cancel_cue.cue: L2M024 SR8 Agents Collect No Space

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where the briefing will be localised

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: ShipName
param.comment: Where the choosen ship will be localized

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored
